overview.en: Bincentive is a smart mirror trading platform that connects trading experts and investors.  We create a win-win scenario for both parties with an innovative financial trading model. BCNT is the utility token for Bincentive ecosystems and will also serve as a reward for establishing the Bincentive ecosystems.
overview.zh: Bincentive是连接交易专家及投资者的智能跟投交易平台。 BCNT Token将作为Utility Token用于Bincentive平台及生态系建立的奖励使用，以创造交易专家及投资者的双赢局面并创造新的金融交易模式。
